text:
I come back to this song quite often, for when I want to relax or when I want to remember the times spent in Earthbound.  

Glad I replay the game often, as going back to each location is always a blast.  

Summers is by far the most memorable location for me, I can vividly remember wandering the street of Summers, or in the back town of Toto.   The people at Club Stoic always giving me a good chuckle, the luxury hotel and buying all the expensive gear from the store.  Glitching the game at the museum after completing the game is always a fun romp.

I'll get back to summers when June or July rolls around, as I find those months the perfect time to replay this beloved classic.
author: Rad Shiba
